record.title: AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 2095, FEDERAL RAILROAD SAFETY IMPROVEMENT ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 2095, FEDERAL RAILROAD SAFETY IMPROVEMENT ACT OF 2007 -- (House of Representatives - October 17, 2007)

[Page: H11696]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that in the engrossment of H.R. 2095, the Clerk be authorized to correct section numbers, punctuation, cross-references, and to make such other technical and conforming changes as may be necessary to accurately reflect the actions of the House.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Minnesota?
